text.0: drink indra juice is shed to make thee joyful loose thy bay steeds and give thy friends their freedom.
text.1: begin the song seated in our assembly give strength for sacrifice to him who singeth.
text.2: drink thou of this whereof at birth o indra thou drankest mighty one for power and rapture.
text.3: the men the pressingstones the cows the waters have made this soma ready for thy drinking.
text.4: the fire is kindled soma pressed o indra let thy bays best to draw convey thee hither.
text.5: with mind devoted indra i invoke thee come for our great prosperity approach us.
text.6: indra come hither evermore thou camest through our great strong desire to drink the soma.
text.7: listen and hear the prayers which now we offer and let this sacrifice increase thy vigour.
text.8: mayst thou o indra on the day of trial present or absent wheresoe’er thou dwellest.
text.9: thence with thy team accordant with the maruts songlover guard our sacrifice to help us.
